SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART V, LINE 4
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PURPOSE OF THE ENDOWMENT FUNDS IS TO PROVIDE SUPPORT TO BOLEY CENTERS, INC. TO CARRY OUT ITS ROLE AND MISSION IN THE GREATER ST. PETERSBURG AREA. DISTRIBUTION OF THE ENDOWMENT FUNDS IS UPON APPROVAL OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE I, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GRANTS ARE MONITORED THROUGH REPORTS DISCUSSED BY THE BOARD QUARTERLY WHICH ARE NOTED IN THE MINUTES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE J, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 3
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR'S COMPENSATION IS DEPENDENT UPON YEARS OF EXPERIENCE, EDUCATION, AND CERTIFICATIONS.
PART I, LINE 4.B. GARY MACMATH PARTICIPATES IN A SUPPLEMENTAL NONQUALIFIED RETIREMENT PLAN. THE ORGANIZATION DID NOT MAKE ANY CONTRIBUTIONS TO THE PLAN FOR THE YEAR ENDING 6/30/18.
PRIOR TO FILING, BOARD MEMBERS RECEIVE A COPY OF FORM 990 FOR APPROVAL.
BOARD MEMBERS ARE REQUIRED TO COMPLETE CONFICT OF INTEREST FORM ANNUALLY.
AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE ON THE STATE OF FLORIDA WEBSITE. NO OTHER GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE PROVIDED TO THE PUBLIC.
GRANT PAID TO BOLEY CENTER -52,180 FUNDRAISING-POSTAGE -5,271 GRANT PAID TO BOLEY CENTER 52,180 FUNDRAISING-POSTAGE 5,271

PART II: IDENTIFICATION OF RELATED TAX EXEMPT ORGANIZATIONS: THE PRIMARY ACTIVITY OF BOLEY CENTERS, INC. IS TO PROVIDE RESIDENTIAL AND EDUCATIONAL SKILLS TRAINING ALONG WITH VARIOUS VOCATIONAL SERVICES TO INDIVIDUALS OF PINELLAS COUNTY WITH CHRONIC MENTAL ILLNESS. PART IV: IDENTIFICATION OF RELATED ORGANIZATIONS TAXABLE AS A CORPORATION: THE PRIMARY ACTIVITY OF SOLUTIONS FOR ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES, INC. (SAS) IS TO PROVIDE MANAGEMENT, SUPPORT AND ADMINISTRATIVE SERVICES TO QUALIFYING TAX-EXEMPT ORGANIZATIONS. SAS IS 50% OWNED BY BOLEY CENTERS, INC. (A RELATED TAX-EXEMPT ORGANIZATION) AND 50% BY ANOTHER UNRELATED TAX-EXEMPT ORGANIZATION. PART V, LINE 2 - ITEMS M, N AND O BOLEY CENTERS PROVIDES MANAGEMENT, PERSONNEL, ACCOUNTING SERVICES, OTHER OPERATIONAL TASKS AND USE OF FACILITIES TO ALL RELATED EXEMPT ORGANIZATIONS.
